content.p: Our research addresses major challenges facing economies and societies in a way that is transformative and makes a real difference to communities across the globe. Our researchers consistently achieve impressive and relevant impact through collaborations with a variety of stakeholders at international, regional and local levels - including those within the commercial, public and charity sectors. In this section, you can read about the impact our research is making, find out more about our cross-cutting research and search our publications database. Find out how our research is creating impact Our centres and institutes Find out more about our departments Nottingham University Business School researchers are involved in a world-first trial to track the entire leather production process using blockchain technology to trace the material from start to finish. “Effective engagement with this diverse continent is becoming a commercial imperative for businesses around the world.” Search our latest research publications Find out more about our researchers Search for our current PhD researchers Browse case studies to see the impact our University research is making around the world Read Nottingham University Business School news. Our blog features in-depth features, opinion pieces and discussions. Find out more about the events we host. Jubilee Campus Nottingham NG8 1BB
